TV Trays on repeat this morning. Ben Gibbard STILL amazes me with his lyrics, which is really incredible I think.
Truly have no idea what's up with my love life at the moment. How odd.
I hope that in computer history books unix beards are not neglected.
I kind of eat Tomatoes with abandon regardless of whatever diseases they might carry.
Taking a bath- I write this from my sidekick in the bath
False alarm- just got home. Doing some stuff, then mowing the lawn.
Mowing the lawn, so someone should call me.
Driving home from camp.
CIT staff meeting. SO much fun.
Denying childrens desires at camp.
Watching kids play capture the flag... this basically runs itself. Sweet.
Just woke up... time for camp!
Going to sleep- wanna wake up early tommorow so that I can pack a travel bag.
Nope- it's definitely a horrible idea.
Debating whether or not taking a bath while AIMing with the sidekick is a horrible idea or not.
Trying to convince my friends to use twitter...
Adding all my contacts to my phone- again. I feel like I'm 11. Weird.

posts.dek: In which the author embarked on a week of creative endeavors in music, projects in coding, and personal growth while house-sitting and planning for the future.

topTracks: Apple & The Three Oranges - I'll Give You A Ring (When I Come, If I Come)
SEE DEE - Makin Mah Way Down Town
Young Thug - Never Had It (feat. Young Dolph)
Girl Talk - Let Me See You
Steve Reich - Reich: Music For 18 Musicians - 3. Section 2
Steve Reich - The Desert Music - Fifth Movement (Fast)
Steve Reich - The Desert Music - Third Movement, Part Two (Moderate)
Steve Reich - Reich: Music For 18 Musicians - 5. Section 3B
Steve Reich - Reich: Music For 18 Musicians - 11. Section 9
The White Stripes - A Martyr for My Love for You
The Chemical Brothers - The Salmon Dance feat. Fatlip

commits.message: feat: BOBBY CAN GO HOME\! Fixed all ESLint errors\!
feat: memory-efficient download batching for large collections
fix: repair broken variables and reduce warnings for Bobby
fix: clean up more unused variables for Bobby's green lights
feat: implement brutalist galaxy map visualization with PixiJS
feat: custom app icon using SF Symbol photo.badge.arrow.down.fill
fix: resolve remaining critical ESLint errors
feat: implement modern ESLint configuration with flat config
feat: add scanning animations and responsive layout improvements
fix: add tauri permissions for file dialog and localStorage for credentials
refactor: standardize 5 remaining components to use shared utilities
refactor: redesign ui with brutalist aesthetic and better ux flow
docs(README): explain how to use new map and json functionality
